messages.message:
:jira: :test_tube: required for pull requests to master branch :pull-request:

we are going to make :danger_systems: required check end of the this week for PRs targeting to merge to master branch, this means you need to make sure two things included in your PR:
1. :jira: Jira ticket ID(s) (no need for the whole url) at the beginning of your PR title, in the format of `[COMPONENT-NUMBER] (e.g. [RELENG-123]` (for hyper trivial ones you can use `JIRA-000` to by pass it but please don't abuse it and make your best effort to file new jiras in this situation, the jira ticket you put there will be used for a few release insights downstream)
2. :test_tube: Test Plan (`N/A` is an valid option to fill for PRs that does not require testing), you will find it in our PR template, just need to filling it in (do not remove the `Test Plan` header when you edit it)
lacking those two elements in your PR will be blocked on merging when we bump the danger check to be required for merging. And :danger_systems: will post to the PR with details on what failed, you can fix it by updating the PR title/description without making another one so it should be fairly easy to fix.
